verses.name: Daniel 8:25
verses.text: And through his policy also he shall cause craft to prosper in his hand; and he shall magnify himself in his heart, and by peace shall destroy many: he shall also stand up against the Prince of princes; but he shall be broken without hand.

verses.name: Daniel 8:26
verses.text: And the vision of the evening and the morning which was told is true: wherefore shut thou up the vision; for it shall be for many days.
